idea:
About Admate :

1) Company accounts dominating share in the burgeoning transit media segment of the out of home advertising market in India.

2) Have collaborations with major cab service providers such as UBER, Meru Cabs, Tab cabs, etc to name a few with market reach in 24 cities across India.

3) Apart from transit media advertising, the company has years of expertise in the different verticals of advertisement such as Cinema Advertising, Radio, branding & print media.

4) Majority of the company clientele are world-renowned brands such as Levis, Pizza Hut, Suzuki, Motorola, Yahoo, PepsiCo etc.
name: ADMATE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Polycystic Ovary Syndrome, or PCOS, is a lifelong disorder that affects 1 in every 5 Indian women (compared to 1 in 10 globally). A majority suffer from comorbidities like depression, obesity, diabetes, hair loss and acne. Like 100M Indian women with PCOS, our founders spent years shuttling from one specialist to another without a clear or coordinated treatment plan. The journey is filled with guesswork, stigma and frustration.

Veera Health is building tools and services to help women with PCOS manage their treatment systematically. Based on each woman’s PCOS symptoms, we create a cross-specialty care plan that is verified with an upfront online visit. We then coordinate her treatment across specialties, deliver medicines and answer ongoing questions through our tech-enabled platform. The Veera Health App is available for all women in India and can be downloaded free of charge on Android and IOS. 

Founded by women who've gone through PCOS and are McKinsey / Wharton / UnitedHealth / Tufts alums, Veera Health is encouraging women to be more proactive about their healthcare. Our vision is to continue building modern solutions that simplify healthcare for Indian women, going beyond PCOS to cover birth control, hair loss and mental health.
name: VEERA HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Medzme is an online pharmacy aggregator company. We offer a large range of genuine healthcare, medicines, OTC & Wellness products in India. We are dealing with all the major retail chain stores pharmacy brands across India. We aim to satisfy each and every customer by providing them genuine high-quality products every day at low prices, delivered to the people's doorstep. Our aim is to take retail pharmacy stores in India from offline to online.


The authenticity of the products matters when it comes to healthcare & pharmacy sector. We partner directly with brands and their authorized channels partners, to ensure strict quality control and deliver 100% genuine products. We don’t stock products; we forward customers’ orders directly to our pharmacy vendors which are nearest to customers location and we deliver it. We also deliver it from the authorized distributor/company from different cities. So, we can ship most of the orders within 24 hours.


More than 3 lakh+ products. The Company's mission is to provide the healthcare solution for all the Healthcare problems and satisfy regular needs of the people at one single platform. We are serving to more than 22K+ pin codes across India.
name: MEDZME PHARMACY MARKETPLACE (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
